attributes.action: No to BNP Teachers In Our Classrooms
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned stand in opposition to the recent decision by the Chief Inspector of Schools Maurice Smith and the Government to allow members of the BNP to remain as teachers. We believe this to be incompatible with the values intrinsic to a well balanced education and wrong in principle. Membership of the BNP or any extremist party to be inimical to ethos of a balanced progressive curriculum. We believe that children should be protected from all those who promote hatred. Teacher attitude to culture and race are important in particular in relation in areas such as teacher expectations, the teaching of history, ethics and religious studies. We call upon the Government to reverse their decision.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
